group_1.textLeft: Did you hear? There's a new girl on the@volleyball team who's incredible!

group_1.textRight: Yeah, I hear that she's 5'11" and super@athletic.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah! She only started playing this year,@but she's a regular team member already.

group_1.narration: Yumi went back to school, and her@volleyball talents got EVEN better!
She was in the starting lineup her first@year, and the top attacker in her second!@Of course she became the bestest@leader on the volleyball team.
Me, on the other hand, weeell...

group_1.textCenter: Good! We'll stop here for today.

group_1.textRight: May I stay behind to rehearse for my@audition, pretty please?

group_1.textLeft: Of course you may. I'll help you.

group_1.textRight: [chara:305301:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Hooray! That makes me super-duper happy!@Tee hee!

group_1.narration: I was really busy with my singing, dancing,@and acting lessons at my new school!
There was so much great stuff there, and@people wanted us to audition ALL the time.@Some of the graduates even went on to@become the bestest stars on TV!
The school wanted us to develop our own@sense of style, so awww, no cute uniforms.@Even so, I really really loved going to school!

group_1.textLeft: Your singing and dancing are really coming@along. Your acting is good, too.

group_1.textRight: [chara:305301:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Tee hee hee! I did my super-duper best!

group_1.textLeft: However, you might want to work on that@phony personality of yours...

group_1.textRight: [chara:305301:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Mhuh?! [chara:305301:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:305301:cheek_1][chara:305301:face_mtn_ex_020.exp.json][chara:305301:lipSynch_1]I-it's not phony! This is how I@always am! Totally!

group_1.textLeft: I can tell that you're lying. You actually@show your true colors quite frequently.
Remember your last audition? The one you@didn't get?
They said they would hire you if you dropped@the cutesy act.

group_1.textRight: Muuurgh. But there's no way EVER that I could@stop doing it.
(Because this is the kind of idol Yumi and@I wanted to become.)

group_1.textLeft: Let me be straight with you, since I@recognize your effort and talent.
The pop idol image you're aspiring to have@is outdated.
I'm not saying you should compromise on @everything.
But it's important to understand current@trends, too. Do remember that.

group_1.narration: Even by the time I graduated,@unlike Yumi, I still hadn't REALLY@achieved anything...
I understood what my teacher told me...@But I just couldn't leave this@super adorable persona behind!
If I did, I wouldn't be achieving@the dream we shared together.
That's probably why...@One day, he appeared before me.
I listened to Kyubey, and I'll admit@his offer was kind of tempting...

group_1.textLeft: I hear what you're saying, and it's true that@I have a dream.
But I don't want to use magic to make it come@true.
I want to earn it, through my own abilities.
So, I won't be forming a contract with you.

group_1.textRight: You can use your wish on something other@than making your dream come true.
You can make a contract with me any time@if you need help.

group_1.narration: I wouldn't be proud of myself if I became@an idol with some mysterious power.
That's why I turned Kyubey down back then.@He was persistent in trying to recruit me,@but I refused him every time.

group_1.textCenter: (I think I failed today's audition, too...)
(There's no point in becoming an idol that@way.)

group_1.textLeft: Hey, Yumi... Are you coming home from@volleyball practice?
Cool...
Huh?
Oh, my audition?
Well... I guess I won't know until I hear@back from them...
Sorry... I'm tired today, so I'm going home.

group_1.narration: I received the results from@that audition a few days later...
